Producer: Adam McKay, Will Ferrell, Kevin J. Messick, Chris Henchy
Synopsis: Don Ready (Jeremy Piven) is many things, but he is best-known as an extraordinary salesman. When a car dealership in Temecula teeters on the brink of bankruptcy, he and his ragtag team (Ving Rhames, James Brolin) dive in to save the day. But what Ready doesn't count on is falling in love and finding his soul.
Title: The Goods: Live Hard. Sell Hard.
